message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you.  While I can't disclose the specific details just yet, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000.  This represents a substantial opportunity for you to acquire something truly special.  Please let me know if you'd like to discuss this further.  I'm confident that you won't be disappointed.
